name: Zombie_Plan
message: Heh I'll admit I'm a bit of a sheep, but if someone recommends something and I value their opinion I'm apt to try it :P So far I'm still liking Disqus and haven't had any problems with it so far. The moment I have problems I'll drop it in a shot though, but I do like threaded comments, and it makes me want to comment on other blogs a lot more too. I love conversing with others over twitter/blogs, but rarely have the motivation.. .-= Zombie_Plan´s last blog ..Ripple effect =-.
